**Official Tender Notice**: Temporary Help Services in the National Capital Region (NCR)
=====================================

**Reference:** **cb-214-7155663**
**Solicitation Number:** S4948860
**Publication Date:** 2024-06-27
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-11T13:00:00

**Description:**
The Department of National Defense (DND) requires temporary help services in the National Capital Region (NCR). This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories: Stream 13 – Policy & Advisory - Stream 13.9 - Special Advisor.

**Invited Suppliers:**

*   Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
*   ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
*   BurntEdge Incorporated
*   HubSpoke Inc.
*   IDS-Plaza Corp
*   Le Groupe Conseil Bronson Consulting Group
*   Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated
*   Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
*   Tech4soft Inc.
*   TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc., in joint venture
*   Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

**Request for Proposal:**
DND has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers who are qualified under the above-mentioned streams and categories. The proposal instructions and tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website.

**Important Dates:**

*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-11T13:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

**Colors and Text Size and Layouts are easily readable - but NOTE: some French texts or symbols are shown the original text - which can not be translated
